channel.title: Posts on stefshine's playground
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on stefshine's playground

item.title: GADTs By Use Cases
item.description: This workshop will be presented at ScalaIO 2019, in Lyon (France), on Tuesday the 29th of October at 9am by Christophe Calv√®s and I. Welcome. This session will introduce you to a very powerful tool in programming. Whereas most introduction start by presenting its theoretical foundations in a very formal way, we chose to present it via short examples and practical use cases. This workshop is made of three parts.

item.title: Hello Word Post
item.description: Hello Word Post Here is a simple Hello Word app in Scala: object Main extends App { def main(args: Array[String]): Unit = println("Hello World") } And in Haskell: module Main where main :: IO () main = putStrLn "Hello World" It was tough, isn’t it ? That’s all for the joke, we will see more interesting things in the next posts.
